{"jsonrpc":"2.0","result":[{"title":"Rate-limits TESTNET adjusted to the rate-limits as on Production.","publication_timestamp":1575975809000,"important":false,"id":1575976002876,"body":"

Today, 10th of December 2019, we have adjusted the rate-limits of our TESTNET to the rate-limits of production. 

This way we are able to provide a better test environment for our users that would like to test their algorithms reacting on reaching the rate-limits.


Deribit

"},{"title":"Maintenance BTC wallets finished.","publication_timestamp":1570731539000,"important":false,"id":1570731561369,"body":"

Today 10/10/19 we finished maintaining our testnet BTC wallets.

Users will have to generate a new deposit and withdrawal address (BTC only).

"},{"title":"Test announcement: Deribit adds LMAX Digital to its indexes","publication_timestamp":1570550689000,"important":false,"id":1570550816755,"body":"
THIS IS A TEST ANNOUNCEMENT

We continue to increase the number of our index constituents and further decrease the risk of market manipulation by adding a new exchange - LMAX Digital to our index calculation. LMAX Digital is a leading exchange in institutional spot trading, and this addition will even further enhance the accuracy of our reference rates. Moreover, we will also be re-introducing Coinbase Pro to the index. This applies to both our Bitcoin index and Ethereum index.
 
This addition will be implemented on 11th October at 08:10 UTC.

END OF TEST ANNOUNCEMENT
"},{"title":"just another test","publication_timestamp":1570544890000,"important":false,"id":1570544918522,"body":"just another test!!"},{"title":"test","publication_timestamp":1570544750000,"important":false,"id":1570544760189,"body":"test announcement"}],"usIn":1579300966904396,"usOut":1579300966904428,"usDiff":32,"testnet":true}
